section.title: (PROFILE CUSTOMIZATION) - additions to inclusion-fstypes
section.para: This module allows the profile to contain specific file system types (fstypes) that should be added to /var/lib/oslockdown/files/inclusion-fstypes processing when this profile is run. The additions are transient, and will not persist past the execution of the profile.

listitem.para:
Additional filesystem types to search
This allows for Profile specific filesystem types that OS Lockdown will include for processing. There should be one file system type per line.
